title: 97/234/EC: Commission Decision of 3 March 1997 amending Decision 96/233/EC establishing the list of approved fish farms in Denmark (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 3 March 1997 amending Decision 96/233/EC establishing the list of approved fish farms in Denmark (Text with EEA relevance) (97/234/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 96/233/EC is hereby replaced by the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 March 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 46, 19. 2. 1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 243, 11. 10. 1995, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 27, 4. 2. 1993, p. 35.
(4) OJ No L 187, 22. 7. 1994, p. 8.
(5) OJ No L 77, 27. 3. 1996, p. 33.
